description:
This data set is a listing of all properties sold by NORA through the following disposition channels.
-Auction: Properties put up for auction and sold to the highest bidder.
-Development: Properties offered via request for proposals to create affordable housing.
-Lot Next Door: Properties sold to adjacent owners.
-Alternate Land Use: Properties sold for purposes of creating green space and used for activities such as community gardens.

name: NORA Sold Properties
